item.title: Getting started with x++
item.description: Hello World # This example will walk the user through creating a job where they can run X++ code within Dynamics AX. There is a node titled Jobs in the Application Object Tree (AOT). This sample can be added under the Jobs node, and then the job can be run. Within Dynamics Ax, open the AOT (Application Object Tree). Navigate to Jobs and right click the node. Click New Job which will cause Ax to open a code editor window.
